article.title: Logos Technologies to Produce Prototype Surveillance Systems
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Lightweight Expeditionary Airborne Persistent Surveillance System

article.text: Logos Technologies, Arlington, Virginia, is being awarded a $9 million contract modification to develop and produce four prototype 59-mega-pixel persistent surveillance systems for field user evaluation. The Lightweight Expeditionary Airborne Persistent Surveillance System is a lightweight expeditionary airborne persistent imagery surveillance system. The Office of Naval Research Laboratory, Arlington, is the contracting activity.
